div.style: padding: 20px 40px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif;
display: flex; gap: 16px; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-bottom: 20px;

background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 0%, rgba(20, 20, 30, 0.9) 100%); color: #FFFFFF; padding: 16px 32px; box-shadow: 6px 6px 24px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.4), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); font-size: 18px; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: 0.05em; border: 2px solid rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3); border-radius: 4px; transition: all 0.3s ease; cursor: pointer;

background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3B82F6 0%, #60A5FA 100%); color: #FFFFFF; padding: 16px 32px; box-shadow: 6px 6px 24px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.5), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); font-size: 18px; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: 0.05em; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;

background: linear-gradient(135deg, #F97316 0%, #FB923C 100%); color: #FFFFFF; padding: 16px 32px; box-shadow: 6px 6px 24px rgba(249, 115, 22, 0.5), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); font-size: 18px; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: 0.05em; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;

background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FFD700 0%, #FFA500 100%); color: #000000; padding: 12px 28px; box-shadow: 6px 6px 24px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.4), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); font-size: 16px; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: 0.05em; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;
